Name: NXLog LinuxAudit
Author: NXLog
Description: The [NXLog LinuxAudit](https://docs.nxlog.co/refman/current/im/linuxaudit.html) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Linux security events. NXLog LinuxAudit supports custom audit rules and collects logs without auditd or any other user-space software. IP addresses and group/user IDs are resolved to their respective names making [Linux audit](https://docs.nxlog.co/userguide/integrate/linux-audit.html) logs more intelligible to security analysts.
